aboutMeContent: I am a developer with 6 years of experience in RPA and 3 years in web development, leading over 10 automation projects across finance, manufacturing, and distribution. Proficient in Vue, Node.js, Python, and C#, I excel at delivering efficient and scalable solutions. I am now preparing to transition into the cybersecurity development field.
project_portfolioDescription: portfolio web site based on Vue.js. I try to descript my career in one single page.
project_rpaBotImprovementDescription: I participated in the improvement of the RPA bot function based on C#.
project_worktroUiImprovementDescription: I participated in the improvement of the Worktro UI based on Vue.js. It was a vue2 -> vue3 migration project, and I collaborated with the designer through Figma.
project_automatedCreditEvaluationDescrip: I automated the credit evaluation process by automatically classifying the received documents and extracting the data from the documents through OCR. I then used the extracted data to verify the amount and write an opinion letter for credit evaluation.
project_monthlySalesClosingJournalEntrie: Monthly Sales Closing Journal Entries Automation
I developed the monthly sales closing journal entries automation for direct stores and franchise stores.
project_seasonalInventoryManagementAutom: I developed the seasonal inventory management automation by collecting the inventory data and linking it to WMS to manage the inventory.
project_inventoryManagementAutomationDes: I developed the inventory management automation by collecting the inventory data and linking it to WMS to manage the inventory.
project_comprehensiveIncomeTaxFilingAuto: I automated the comprehensive income tax filing by collecting the data from WehagoT and ERP.
project_serverMaintenanceAutomationDescr: I automated the server maintenance by connecting to the server through putty and entering commands.
project_powerGenerationTaxInvoiceAutomat: I automated the power generation tax invoice issuance by collecting the data from REC and MES.
project_covid19QuarantineNoticeAutomatio: I automated the Covid-19 quarantine notice sending by sending the Covid-19 quarantine notice.
project_depositAndAccountingJournalEntry: Deposit and Accounting Journal Entry Automation
I automated the deposit and accounting journal entry by collecting the data from the deposit and accounting journal entry.
project_ediDataCollectionAndUploadAutoma: EDI Data Collection and Upload Automation
I automated the EDI data collection and upload by collecting the data from the EDI data collection and upload.
project_endToEndAutomationOfLifeInsuranc: End-to-End Automation of Life Insurance Operations
I automated the end-to-end life insurance operations by collecting the data from the end-to-end life insurance operations.
